activities: Mailing & distribution of sales, advertising & general communications materials.
recoursemech:
All complaints are investigated by our independent quality assurance person. Deviations from the documented procedures are reported to the VP Quality Control/Assurance who initiates an investigation of the circumstances surrounding the problem. Upon conclusion of this investigation, appropriate actions are taken to ensure that there are no repeat occurrences of reported infraction. Our SOP CO-012 outlines complaint handling procedures in detail. 
The Direct Marketing Association (DMA) will serve as our independent recourse provider.
